verses.text: \w Then|strong="G1161"\w* came \w he|strong="G2658"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Derbe|strong="G1191"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lystra|strong="G3082"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, a \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w disciple|strong="G3101"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w*, \w named|strong="G3686"\w* \w Timotheus|strong="G5095"\w*, the \w son|strong="G5207"\w* of a \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w woman|strong="G1135"\w*, which was a \w Jewess|strong="G2453"\w*, and \w believed|strong="G4103"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* his \w father|strong="G3962"\w* \add was\add* a \w Greek|strong="G1672"\w*:

\w Which|strong="G3739"\w* was well \w reported|strong="G3140"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* by the \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* that \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Lystra|strong="G3082"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Iconium|strong="G2430"\w*.

\w Him|strong="G5126"\w* \w would|strong="G2309"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* have to go \w forth|strong="G1831"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w took|strong="G2983"\w* and \w circumcised|strong="G4059"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w because|strong="G1223"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* which \w were|strong="G5607"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w those|strong="G1565"\w* \w quarters|strong="G5117"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* they \w knew|strong="G1492"\w* \w all|strong="G0537"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w father|strong="G3962"\w* \w was|strong="G5225"\w* a \w Greek|strong="G1672"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* they went \w through|strong="G1279"\w* the \w cities|strong="G4172"\w*, they \w delivered|strong="G3860"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* the \w decrees|strong="G1378"\w* for to \w keep|strong="G5442"\w*, that were \w ordained|strong="G2919"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* the \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w elders|strong="G4245"\w* which \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*.

\w And|strong="G3303"\w* \w so|strong="G3767"\w* \w were|strong="G4732"\w* the \w churches|strong="G1577"\w* \w established|strong="G4732"\w* \w in|strong="G2596"\w* the \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w increased|strong="G4052"\w* in \w number|strong="G0706"\w* \w daily|strong="G2250"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* when they had gone \w throughout|strong="G1330"\w* \w Phrygia|strong="G5435"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w region|strong="G5561"\w* of \w Galatia|strong="G1054"\w*, and were \w forbidden|strong="G2967"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* the \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w* to \w preach|strong="G2980"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Asia|strong="G0773"\w*,

\w After|strong="G2596"\w* they were \w come|strong="G2064"\w* to \w Mysia|strong="G3465"\w*, they \w assayed|strong="G3985"\w* to \w go|strong="G4198"\w* \w into|strong="G2596"\w* \w Bithynia|strong="G0978"\w*: \w but|strong="G2532"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w suffered|strong="G1439"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*.
\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w passing|strong="G3928"\w* by \w Mysia|strong="G3465"\w* came \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Troas|strong="G5174"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* a \w vision|strong="G3705"\w* \w appeared|strong="G3700"\w* to \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w in|strong="G1223"\w* the \w night|strong="G3571"\w*; There \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* a \w man|strong="G0435"\w* of \w Macedonia|strong="G3110"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w prayed|strong="G3870"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, Come \w over|strong="G1224"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Macedonia|strong="G3109"\w*, and \w help|strong="G0997"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w after|strong="G5613"\w* he had \w seen|strong="G1492"\w* the \w vision|strong="G3705"\w*, \w immediately|strong="G2112"\w* we \w endeavoured|strong="G2212"\w* to \w go|strong="G1831"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Macedonia|strong="G3109"\w*, assuredly \w gathering|strong="G4822"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* had \w called|strong="G4341"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* for to preach the \w gospel|strong="G2097"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w loosing|strong="G0321"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Troas|strong="G5174"\w*, we came with a straight \w course|strong="G2113"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Samothracia|strong="G4543"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* the \w next|strong="G1966"\w* \add day\add* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Neapolis|strong="G3496"\w*;

\w And|strong="G5037"\w* from \w thence|strong="G1564"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Philippi|strong="G5375"\w*, \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w chief|strong="G4413"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w* of that \w part|strong="G3310"\w* of \w Macedonia|strong="G3109"\w*, \add and\add* a \w colony|strong="G2862"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* we \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w that|strong="G3778"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w* \w abiding|strong="G1304"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*.

\w And|strong="G5037"\w* on the \w sabbath|strong="G4521"\w* we \w went|strong="G1831"\w* out \w of|strong="G1854"\w* the \w city|strong="G4172"\w* \w by|strong="G3844"\w* a river \w side|strong="G4215"\w*, \w where|strong="G3757"\w* \w prayer|strong="G4335"\w* was \w wont|strong="G3543"\w* to be \w made|strong="G1511"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* we sat \w down|strong="G2523"\w*, and \w spake|strong="G2980"\w* unto the \w women|strong="G1135"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w resorted|strong="G4905"\w* \add thither.\add*

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* a \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* \w named|strong="G3686"\w* \w Lydia|strong="G3070"\w*, a seller of \w purple|strong="G4211"\w*, of the \w city|strong="G4172"\w* of \w Thyatira|strong="G2363"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w worshipped|strong="G4576"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \add us\add*: whose \w heart|strong="G2588"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w opened|strong="G1272"\w*, that she attended \w unto|strong="G4337"\w* the things \w which|strong="G3588"\w* were \w spoken|strong="G2980"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G5613"\w* she was \w baptized|strong="G0907"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w household|strong="G3624"\w*, she \w besought|strong="G3870"\w* \add us\add*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w If|strong="G1487"\w* ye have \w judged|strong="G2919"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w* to \w be|strong="G1511"\w* \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* to the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w come|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w*, and \w abide|strong="G3306"\w* \add there\add*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* she \w constrained|strong="G3849"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* it came to \w pass|strong="G1096"\w*, as \w we|strong="G2257"\w* \w went|strong="G4198"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w prayer|strong="G4335"\w*, a \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w damsel|strong="G3814"\w* \w possessed|strong="G2192"\w* with a \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* of \w divination|strong="G4436"\w* \w met|strong="G0528"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w*, \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w brought|strong="G3930"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w masters|strong="G2962"\w* \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w gain|strong="G2039"\w* by \w soothsaying|strong="G3132"\w*:

The \w same|strong="G3778"\w* \w followed|strong="G2628"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w*, and \w cried|strong="G2896"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w These|strong="G3778"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w* \w are|strong="G1526"\w* the \w servants|strong="G1401"\w* of the most \w high|strong="G5310"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w which|strong="G3748"\w* shew \w unto|strong="G2605"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w* the \w way|strong="G3598"\w* of \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* did \w she|strong="G4160"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*. \w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, being \w grieved|strong="G1278"\w*, \w turned|strong="G1994"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* to the \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, I \w command|strong="G3853"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* to come \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* he came \w out|strong="G1831"\w* the \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w hour|strong="G5610"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* when \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w masters|strong="G2962"\w* \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* the \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* of \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w gains|strong="G2039"\w* was \w gone|strong="G1831"\w*, they \w caught|strong="G1949"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Silas|strong="G4609"\w*, and \w drew|strong="G1670"\w* \add them\add* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w marketplace|strong="G0058"\w* \w unto|strong="G1909"\w* the \w rulers|strong="G0758"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w brought|strong="G4317"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* to the \w magistrates|strong="G4755"\w*, \w saying|strong="G2036"\w*, \w These|strong="G3778"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*, \w being|strong="G5225"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, do exceedingly \w trouble|strong="G1613"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w teach|strong="G2605"\w* \w customs|strong="G1485"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w are|strong="G1832"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w lawful|strong="G1832"\w* for \w us|strong="G2254"\w* to \w receive|strong="G3858"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3761"\w* to \w observe|strong="G4160"\w*, \w being|strong="G5607"\w* \w Romans|strong="G4514"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w multitude|strong="G3793"\w* rose up \w together|strong="G4911"\w* \w against|strong="G2596"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w magistrates|strong="G4755"\w* rent \w off|strong="G4048"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w clothes|strong="G2440"\w*, and \w commanded|strong="G2753"\w* to \w beat|strong="G4463"\w* \add them\add*.

\w And|strong="G5037"\w* when they had \w laid|strong="G2007"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w stripes|strong="G4127"\w* upon \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, they \w cast|strong="G0906"\w* \add them\add* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w prison|strong="G5438"\w*, \w charging|strong="G3853"\w* the \w jailor|strong="G1200"\w* to \w keep|strong="G5083"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w safely|strong="G0806"\w*:

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w*, having \w received|strong="G2983"\w* \w such|strong="G5108"\w* a \w charge|strong="G3852"\w*, \w thrust|strong="G0906"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w inner|strong="G2082"\w* \w prison|strong="G5438"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w made|strong="G0805"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w feet|strong="G4228"\w* \w fast|strong="G0805"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* the \w stocks|strong="G3586"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w at|strong="G2596"\w* \w midnight|strong="G3317"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Silas|strong="G4609"\w* \w prayed|strong="G4336"\w*, and sang \w praises|strong="G5214"\w* unto \w God|strong="G2316"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* the \w prisoners|strong="G1198"\w* \w heard|strong="G1874"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w suddenly|strong="G0869"\w* there \w was|strong="G1096"\w* a \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w earthquake|strong="G4578"\w*, so \w that|strong="G5620"\w* the \w foundations|strong="G2310"\w* of the \w prison|strong="G1201"\w* were \w shaken|strong="G4531"\w*: \w and|strong="G5037"\w* \w immediately|strong="G3916"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w doors|strong="G2374"\w* were \w opened|strong="G0455"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* every \w one’s|strong="G3956"\w* \w bands|strong="G1199"\w* were \w loosed|strong="G0447"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the keeper of the \w prison|strong="G1200"\w* awaking \w out|strong="G1096"\w* of his \w sleep|strong="G1853"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w seeing|strong="G1492"\w* the \w prison|strong="G5438"\w* \w doors|strong="G2374"\w* \w open|strong="G0455"\w*, he drew \w out|strong="G4685"\w* his \w sword|strong="G3162"\w*, and \w would|strong="G3195"\w* have \w killed|strong="G0337"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*, supposing \w that|strong="G3543"\w* the \w prisoners|strong="G1198"\w* had been \w fled|strong="G1628"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w cried|strong="G5455"\w* with a \w loud|strong="G3173"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Do|strong="G4238"\w* \w thyself|strong="G4572"\w* \w no|strong="G3367"\w* \w harm|strong="G2556"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* we \w are|strong="G2070"\w* \w all|strong="G0537"\w* \w here|strong="G1759"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* he \w called|strong="G0154"\w* for a \w light|strong="G5457"\w*, and sprang \w in|strong="G1530"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w came|strong="G1096"\w* \w trembling|strong="G1790"\w*, and fell \w down|strong="G4363"\w* before \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Silas|strong="G4609"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w brought|strong="G4254"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w out|strong="G1854"\w*, and \w said|strong="G5346"\w*, \w Sirs|strong="G2962"\w*, \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w must|strong="G1163"\w* \w I|strong="G3165"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* to \w be|strong="G2443"\w* \w saved|strong="G4982"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* shalt be \w saved|strong="G4982"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w spake|strong="G2980"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w all|strong="G3956"\w* that \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w house|strong="G3614"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w took|strong="G3880"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* the \w same|strong="G1565"\w* \w hour|strong="G5610"\w* of the \w night|strong="G3571"\w*, and \w washed|strong="G3068"\w* \add their\add* \w stripes|strong="G4127"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* was \w baptized|strong="G0907"\w*, \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w*, \w straightway|strong="G3916"\w*.

\w And|strong="G5037"\w* when he had \w brought|strong="G0321"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w*, he \w set|strong="G3908"\w* \w meat|strong="G5132"\w* before \w them|strong="G3908"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w rejoiced|strong="G0021"\w*, \w believing|strong="G4100"\w* in \w God|strong="G2316"\w* with all his \w house|strong="G3832"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G1096"\w* it was \w day|strong="G2250"\w*, the \w magistrates|strong="G4755"\w* \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* the \w serjeants|strong="G4465"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Let|strong="G0630"\w* \w those|strong="G1565"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w* \w go|strong="G0630"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the keeper of the \w prison|strong="G1200"\w* \w told|strong="G0518"\w* \w this|strong="G5128"\w* \w saying|strong="G3056"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, The \w magistrates|strong="G4755"\w* have \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* let you \w go|strong="G0630"\w*: \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w depart|strong="G1831"\w*, and \w go|strong="G4198"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w said|strong="G5346"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, They have \w beaten|strong="G1194"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w openly|strong="G1219"\w* \w uncondemned|strong="G0178"\w*, \w being|strong="G5225"\w* \w Romans|strong="G4514"\w*, and have \w cast|strong="G0906"\w* \add us\add* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w prison|strong="G5438"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* do they \w thrust|strong="G1544"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w out|strong="G1544"\w* \w privily|strong="G2977"\w*? \w nay|strong="G3756"\w* \w verily|strong="G1063"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* let them \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w themselves|strong="G0846"\w* and \w fetch|strong="G1806"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w out|strong="G1806"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w serjeants|strong="G4465"\w* \w told|strong="G0312"\w* \w these|strong="G5023"\w* \w words|strong="G4487"\w* unto the \w magistrates|strong="G4755"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w feared|strong="G5399"\w*, when they \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* they \w were|strong="G1526"\w* \w Romans|strong="G4514"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w came|strong="G2064"\w* and \w besought|strong="G3870"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w brought|strong="G1806"\w* \add them\add* \w out|strong="G1806"\w*, and \w desired|strong="G2065"\w* \add them\add* to \w depart|strong="G1831"\w* out of the \w city|strong="G4172"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w went|strong="G1831"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w prison|strong="G5438"\w*, and \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \add the house of\add* \w Lydia|strong="G3070"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* when they had \w seen|strong="G1492"\w* the \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, they \w comforted|strong="G3870"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w departed|strong="G1831"\w*.
